pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Functions to Install and Maintain 'LaTeX', and Compile 'LaTeX' Documents // Helper functions to install and maintain the 'LaTeX' distribution named 'TinyTeX' (https://yihui.name/tinytex/), a lightweight and portable version of 'TeX Live'. This package also contains helper functions to compile 'LaTeX' documents, and install missing 'LaTeX' packages automatically.
